name: CviCloudSmartHomeSkill
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control your CviCloud and Opro9 Smart Home products from anywhere using Alexa!
It can control Opro9 Smart Light Bulb Socket and Switch by this skill like:
"Alexa, turn on the light"
"Alexa, set the brightness of light to eighty"

How to use:
1. Enable this skill in Alexa app
2. Login in with your Opro9 Home account by login page if it is your first time launch
3. Discover the Opro9/CviCloud devices every time you add new devices

For users don't have the Opro9 Home accounts, please get Opro9 Home app and register within it.
